statements: UPDATE social_media_post_scheduling SET post_content = 'New Post Content' WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_post_scheduling SET engagement_score = 7.5, user_id = 101, post_date = '2023-10-15 08:00:00' WHERE post_id = 2;
UPDATE social_media_post_scheduling SET post_content = 'Updated content', engagement_score = 9.5 WHERE post_id = 123;
UPDATE social_media_post_scheduling SET engagement_score = 8.2, user_id = 456, post_date = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE post_id = 456;
UPDATE post_engagement SET engagement_score = 8.5 WHERE post_id = 123
UPDATE schedule SET is_posted = true, scheduled_time = '2022-01-15 10:00:00' WHERE schedule_id = 456
UPDATE post_engagement SET post_content = 'Updated content', engagement_score = 9.5 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE schedule SET scheduled_time = '2022-12-31 23:59:59', is_posted = true WHERE schedule_id = 2;
UPDATE social_media_posts SET engagement_score = 50 WHERE post_id = 101;
UPDATE user_engagement SET likes_count = 300, followers_count = 500 WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE social_media_posts SET engagement_score = 100 WHERE post_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_engagement SET followers_count = followers_count + 100, likes_count = likes_count - 50 WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='new_email@example.com', engagement_score=8.9 WHERE user_id=12345;
UPDATE post_schedule SET post_content='Updated post content', engagement_level='High' WHERE post_id=54321;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='newemail@example.com', engagement_score=8.5 WHERE user_id=123
UPDATE post_schedule SET post_content='Updated content', engagement_level='High' WHERE post_id=456
UPDATE posts SET post_content = 'Updated content' WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE engagements SET engagement_type = 'Like' WHERE post_id = 3 AND user_id = 5;
UPDATE posts SET post_content = 'Updated content', post_date = '2022-01-20' WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET user_name = 'NewName', user_role = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 5;
